headline: Will Exelon (EXC) Beat Estimates Again in Its Next Earnings Report?
summary: Exelon (EXC) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.

headline: Exelon Announces Additional $10 Million Contribution to Customer Relief Fund, Supporting Customers as Winter Weather Drives Higher Energy Use
summary: CHICAGO, January 14, 2026--Exelon (Nasdaq: EXC) today announced an additional $10 million contribution to its Customer Relief Fund, strengthening support for communities as cold weather drives up energy demand and costs remain high.
